overview: The story of the perfect man and woman in Eden, and the temptation of Mother Eve by Lucifer. Many episodes are then presented showing how Satan, from the time of Eden until now, has sought to thwart God's purposes and how, ultimately, Satan will be overthrown, and how restitution blessings will then come to mankind.
tagline: A FILM STORY OF THE AGES-FROM THE CREATION OF MAN TO THE PRESENT DAY.
title: Restitution
